org.jogger.test
Class MockJoggerServlet

java.lang.Object
  javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
          org.jogger.AbstractJoggerServlet
              org.jogger.test.MockJoggerServlet
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig
public class MockJoggerServlet
extends AbstractJoggerServlet

This class is used to test Jogger without a Servlet Container. It emulates the Servlet environment. It exposes new methods to set the ControllerLoader, the routes file path, the templates path and the interceptors.

Author:
German Escobar
See Also:
